data: {"generalSituation":"The winter monsoon will continue to bring cold weather to southern China today and tomorrow. Meanwhile, the broad band of clouds covering the region will thin out slightly. Daytime temperatures will rise on the weekend over the region. The monsoon is expected to be replaced by a fresh to strong easterly airstream early next week. The northeast monsoon will affect Guangdong in the middle and latter parts of next week.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20260123","week":"Friday","forecastWind":"North to northeast force 3 to 4.","forecastWeather":"Mainly cloudy. Cold in the morning.
